sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CoordRounder</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CoordRounder</name>
        <script><![CDATA[//https://github.com/mfogel/polygon-clipping/blob/v0.15.3/src/rounder.js
var CoordRounder = Class.create();
CoordRounder.prototype = {
    initialize: function () {
        this.tree = new SplayTree();
		// preseed with 0 so we don't end up with values < Number.EPSILON
		this.round(0);
    },
    type: 'CoordRounder',
	
	round: function(coord) {
    var node = this.tree.add(coord);

    var prevNode = this.tree.prev(node);
    if (prevNode !== null && TurfUnionUtils.cmp(node.key, prevNode.key) === 0) {
      this.tree.remove(coord);
      return prevNode.key;
    }

    var nextNode = this.tree.next(node);
    if (nextNode !== null && TurfUnionUtils.cmp(node.key, nextNode.key) === 0) {
      this.tree.remove(coord);
      return nextNode.key;
    }
    return coord;
  }
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-01-23 08:54:56</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>78bdf23988e42110fa9bf275d1a04390</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CoordRounder</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">fa60558563b044509d2cba84af9c019c</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_78bdf23988e42110fa9bf275d1a04390</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-01-30 14:20:08</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
